statements: DELETE FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE surgery_date = '2022-01-15' AND surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith';
DELETE FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND procedure_type = 'Knee Replacement';
DELETE FROM robotic_surgeries WHERE surgery_duration > 3.5 AND surgery_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM surgeries WHERE surgery_type = 'Heart Surgery' AND surgery_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM surgeons WHERE name = 'Dr. Smith'
DELETE FROM complications WHERE surgery_id = 1 AND complication_type = 'Infection';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM RobotSurgeries WHERE surgery_id = 1001 AND patient_id = 2001
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 60
